summary: Provides helper utilities that simplify working with MONAI inside Jupyter notebooks, including status tracking for Ignite engines, asynchronous engine execution, conversion of tensors to displayable images, and Matplotlib‑based visualizations of training metrics and image outputs.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to interactively monitor and visualize deep learning training processes in notebook environments, reducing the effort required to set up real‑time plots and engine management.
